sentence.Network_en: The nucellus is usually degraded and absorbed as the endosperm develops.
sentence.Network_cn: 珠心通常在胚乳发育时被分解和吸收.

sentence.Network_en: Food materials may be stored in a special tissue derived from the nucellus, called the perisperm.
sentence.Network_cn: 营养物质可以贮藏于由珠心产生的一种特殊组织, 叫外胚乳.

sentence.Network_en: The cells of the integument and nucellus of some plants form perfectly normal embryos.
sentence.Network_cn: 某些植物的珠被和珠心细胞形成完全正常的胚.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...6，图8-37)。胚珠发生时，首先由胎座表皮下层细胞进行分裂，产生突起，成为胚珠原基。(图8-38)原基前端成为珠心(nucellus)，原基基部将发育成珠柄(funiculus)。以后，在珠心基部发生环状突起逐渐向上生长扩展，将珠心包.

list.abs: nucellus 珠心nucellus embryo 珠心胚nuchal organ 颈器

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: modern Latin, apparently an irregular diminutive of nucleus

means.word_mean: 1. central part of a plant ovule; contains the embryo sac
